original_text: For this cause the people also met him, for that they heard that he had done this miracle.
korean_text: 이에 무리가 예수를 맞음은 이 표적 행하심을 들었음이러라

sentences.original_text: For this cause the people also met him
for that they heard that he had done this miracle
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 기적을 행했다는 것을 들었기 때문이니라
